alert.note: Alert for Clark; Garland; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 3:24PM CDT until July 28 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL CLARK...SOUTH CENTRAL GARLAND AND CENTRAL HOT SPRING COUNTIES... At 323 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near DeGray Lake State Park, or 12 miles south of Hot Springs, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Caddo Valley... Lofton... DeGray Lake State Park... Donaldson... Friendship... Bismarck... Red Oak... De Roche... Lake Catherine State Park... Pettyview... Midway in Hot Spring County... Social Hill... This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 80 and 91. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
